entry.title: New release for AdGuardHome Sync: v0.7.8
entry.content:

  • Fails with "Replica AdGuard Home version must be >= v0.107.40" when running AdGuard Home beta version #607

Changelog

  • 04bd12d7dd3c5eb8b42b2d961e62663a84348d5b feat: Add OpenBSD support to releaser. (#605)
